attributes.action: Don't scrap Government plans to resettle unaccompanied refugee children
attributes.additional_details:
BBC report on the end of the Dubs scheme
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-38912428
attributes.background: The Government promised to resettle unaccompanied refugee children through the Dubs scheme. This scheme has just been scrapped after committing to take in just a few hundred children, rather than the target of 3,000. We need to reinstate the Dubs scheme and help thousands more vulnerable children.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
